errors.complaintLock: The complaint is still locked by {{user}} until {{lockEnd}}!

complaint.title: Complaint
complaint.info: The complaint limit refers to open and rejected complaints. If your complaint is accepted it will not count towards this total.
complaint.description: You may submit up to {{ maxComplaintNumber }} complaints in this course.
complaint.descriptionExam: You can submit one complaint for each manually assessed exercise in this exam.
complaint.descriptionExtended: Every student is allowed to complain once per exercise. In total {{ maxComplaintNumber }} complaints are possible in this course. You still have {{ allowedComplaints }} complaints left.
complaint.descriptionTeam: Your team may submit up to {{ maxComplaintNumber }} complaints in this course.
complaint.descriptionTeamExtended: Every team is allowed to complain once per exercise. In total {{ maxComplaintNumber }} complaints are possible in this course. Your team still has {{ allowedComplaints }} complaints left.
complaint.exclusivityDisclaimer: Complaints and More Feedback Requests are exclusive to each other. You can only submit one or the other.
complaint.beDescriptive: Please describe in detail why the assessment is wrong. Your complaint will then be evaluated by a second reviewer.
complaint.beDescriptiveTeam: Please describe in detail why the assessment is wrong. Your submission will then be re-evaluated by your tutor.
complaint.alreadySubmittedSubmissionAuthor: You have already submitted a complaint
complaint.alreadySubmittedNotSubmissionAuthor: The student has already submitted a complaint
complaint.complaintNotAllowedTooltip: Currently not allowed: complaint limit reached or assessment review period is over.
complaint.hint: Scroll down to review the complaint
complaint.tooManyComplaints: Complaint limit reached. You may not have more than {{ maxComplaintNumber }} open or rejected complaints at the same time.
complaint.exceededComplaintTextLimit: Maximum number of characters for the complaints reached. You can't use more than {{ maxComplaintTextLimit }} characters.
complaint.exceededComplaintResponseTextLimit: Maximum number of characters for the complaint response reached. You can't use more than {{ maxComplaintRespondTextLimit }} characters.

listOfComplaints.title: List of complaints
listOfComplaints.loadAllComplaintsExplanation: The list only shows filed complaints about your assessments. You can load all complaints about all reviewers by clicking this button:
listOfComplaints.noComplaintsToShow: There are no complaints to show at the moment

complaint.oneWeekUnanswered: Complaints should be answered within one week if possible!

moreFeedback.title: More Feedback Request
moreFeedback.description: If something is not clear enough and you need more explanation, you can request the tutor to provide more feedback
moreFeedback.descriptionTeam: If something is not clear enough and you need more explanation, you can request your tutor to provide more feedback
moreFeedback.beDescriptive: Please describe in detail what is unclear to you about the assessment. Your request will then be evaluated by the same reviewer.
moreFeedback.beDescriptiveTeam: Please describe in detail what is unclear to you about the assessment. Your tutor will then clarify their assessment.
moreFeedback.created: Your More Feedback Request has been submitted!
moreFeedback.info: Submitting feedback request will not affect number of maximum complaints, but your score will remain unchanged.
moreFeedback.alreadySubmittedSubmissionAuthor: You have already requested more feedback
moreFeedback.alreadySubmittedNotSubmissionAuthor: The student has already requested more feedback
moreFeedback.notAllowedTooltip: Currently not allowed: assessment is older than one week

list.title: List of More Feedback Requests
list.loadAllRequestsExplanation: The list only shows requests about your assessments. You can load all requests for all reviewers using this button:
list.noRequestsToShow: There are no requests to show at the moment

moreFeedback.hint: Scroll down to review More Feedback Request
